quote: No need to hurry. No need to sparkle. No need to be anybody but oneself. – Virginia Woolf
fact: China has more English speakers than the United States.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: If you’re struggling to think of what to get someone for Christmas. Get them a fridge and watch their face light up when they open it.
